skills.name: Soloist's Solicitation
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].\nIf this character's HP is higher than 15, switches to {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Ousia.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>.\nIf this character's HP is higher than 15, switches to {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Ousia.
skills.description:
Deals Physical DMG.
If this character's HP is higher than 15, switches to Arkhe: Ousia.

skills.name: Let the People Rejoice
skills.description: Deals Hydro DMG, creates Universal Revelry and 10 Revelry.

skills.name: Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When the battle begins: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A7211]</color> is currently in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Ousia state. Summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C172111]</color>.\n(When $[A7211] is in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Pneuma state, she will summon <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C172112]</color>)
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When the battle begins: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Furina</color> is currently in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Ousia state. Summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>Salon Members</color>.\n(When Furina is in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Pneuma state, she will summon <color=#FFFFFFFF>Singer of Many Waters</color>)
skills.description:
(Passive) When the battle begins: Furina is currently in the Arkhe: Ousia state. Summons Salon Members.
(When Furina is in the Arkhe: Pneuma state, she will summon Singer of Many Waters)
